name: Clouds blooming [DEMO]
description:
───── Plot

A new soul of life, which was scheduled to be born in spring, the main character opens his eyes in winter, one early season due to an error in something. The duodenal gods, who were working as guardians of the Four Seasons, are starting to move quickly to respond to them?

───── Game Introduction

Title: Clouds Blooming (Korean: 앙연(雵䜩) :: 흰 구름이 피어나길 이야기하다.)
Version: Trial

Hello!  My name is Curry Party. I started making. because I like Hanbok!

I'm very nervous. This game The production is in progress. Please cheer for the completion.(I'm preparing to get a job. so I don't know this game when it will be completed...)
